Langenthal and the time with the best weather for a holiday

Langenthal: do you want to know which is the hottest month: the hottest month of the year is July where temperatures can reach 21°C.

If instead you are cold lovers the best month with the coldes temperatures is January, where the temperature can drop to 2°C.

On average in Langenthal you will find an average temperature of 12°C.
